snippet.title: Gateways Trailer (Sep 2012)
snippet.description:
Gateways is out now for Steam, Desura and XBLIG!

DRM-free - http://www.smudgedcat.com/gateways.htm
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/216290/
Desura - http://www.desura.com/games/gateways
XBLIG - http://marketplace.xbox.com/games/media/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d80258550bea

From the creative mind behind The Adventures of Shuggy comes an exciting new retro-styled 2D platformer, a winner of Dream Build Play 2012.  GameZebo gave it 5 stars and called it "An inter-dimensional 8-bit masterpiece" while Rock Paper Shotgun described it as "a genuinely smart, incredibly challenging puzzle platformer, that's just packed with ideas and extremely well executed".

Grab the gateway guns and explore a huge lab filled with mysterious puzzles in this classic platforming adventure.  Use gateway technology to leap from one place to another, change size to explore small passages or defeat large enemies, walk on walls and ceilings to reach new areas and even travel in time to work together with past echoes of yourself.

Move seamlessly between different areas of the vast labyrinthian map with no waiting for loading screens as you explore and discover new power ups.  Use each of your new abilities to progress further, unlock shortcuts and find even more power ups.

http://www.smudgedcat.com/gateways.htm

http://twitter.com/SmudgedCat
